item.title: Breadcrumb Berries Fruit Cake
item.dc:creator: demo@themegrill
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 20 min Cooking time: 1 hr 20 min Ready in: 1 hour 10 min Add fruit accent for the great aroma and serve frozen to enhance the sweetness of this dish.

Ingredients

  • 200 gm breadcrumb
  • 2 large eggs
  • 500 gm cake flour
  • 10 gm baking powder
  • 10 gm yeast
  • 5 Tbsp sugar
  • 1/5 Tbsp salt
  • 2 cups unsaturated milk
  • 500 gm berries
 

Direction

  1. In a mixing bowl, combine breadcrumb, eggs, cake flour, baking powder, yeast, sugar, salt, and milk. Mix well and make a doe.
  2. Pre-heat oven at 220c
  3. Add that doe you made in cake pan and bake it at 220c for 20 minutes
  4. Cut berries as you like.
  5. Now take out the cake and decorate it with whip cream and toppingswith berries.

item.title: Rice Noodles
item.dc:creator: demo@themegrill
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 20 min Cooking time: 1 hr 20 min Ready in: 1 hour 10 min Add fruit accent for the great aroma and serve frozen to enhance the sweetness of this dish.

Ingredients

  • 200 gm breadcrumb
  • 2 large eggs
  • 500 gm cake flour
  • 10 gm baking powder
  • 10 gm yeast
  • 5 Tbsp sugar
  • 1/5 Tbsp salt
  • 2 cups unsaturated milk
  • 500 gm berries
 

Direction

  1. In a mixing bowl, combine breadcrumb, eggs, cake flour, baking powder, yeast, sugar, salt, and milk. Mix well and make a doe.
  2. Pre-heat oven at 220c
  3. Add that doe you made in cake pan and bake it at 220c for 20 minutes
  4. Cut berries as you like.
  5. Now take out the cake and decorate it with whip cream and toppingswith berries.

item.title: Authentic Italian Pizza
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 30 min Cooking time: 1 hr Ready in: 1 hour 30 min Thisthin crust pizza dough recipe will be a hit in your house.

Ingredients

  • 5 c flour + some for dusting
  • 1 1/2 tsp yeast
  • 1 1/2 tsp sea salt
  • 2 1/4 c cold water
  • 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil
  • 2-3 spoonpizza sauce

Toppings suggestions

  • Caramelized onions
  • Arrabiata Sauce
  • Grilled Bell Peppers
  • Heirloom Tomatoes
  • Fresh Basil
  • Green Onions
  • Smoked Mozzarella Cheese
  • Sauteed Mushrooms
  • Ricotta Meatballs

Direction

  1. Preheat your oven as high as it will go for at least 45 minutes to one hour..
  2. Mix the flour, sea salt and yeast on low speed until all is incorporated then add the water.
  3. The dough should be smooth and sticky but should not stick to the sides of the bowl, only a little to the bottom.
  4. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with the basil and freshly grated parmigiana reggianno.
  5. Pour 2-3 tablespoons of the pizza sauce in the center and spread it around with the back of a spoon leaving 1 inch of space at the edges.
  6. Allow to rest for a few minute for the cheese to set.
  7. If topping with heirloom tomato slices, make sure to use the firm ones, otherwise the pizza would be watery.

item.title: Charlotte Christmas cake
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 30 min Cooking time: 1 hr Ready in: 1 hour 30 min A charlotte cake with a delicious and greener Christmas theme.

Ingredients

  • 500 gr of Savoyards
  • 3 cups of espresso sugaredg
  • 150 grams of sugar
  • 4 eggs
  • 100 gr of flour
  • 250 ml of milk
  • 3 tablespoons of soluble coffee

Toppings suggestions

  • sugar or coconut
  • Christmas puppets or other decorations to please

Direction

  1. Put the egg yolks in a large bowl with the sugar
  2. Fit the mixture and mix until you get a sparkling cream, almost white.
  3. Pour milk and three tablespoons of soluble coffee, stirring until it is completely dissolved.
  4. Add the sifted flour
  5. Now place the cream in a thick bottom pan and bake it on a low flame.
  6. Now pour the mixture into a bowl and cover with the transparent film, making sure the film does not touch the cream.
  7. Put everything in the fridge and let it cool down.
  8. Cover the edges and the base of a 16 cm diameter round ring with the savoiards wetted in sugary hot coffee
  9. Put chantilly cream in the coffee base.
  10. Transfer the cake into the fridge for at least a couple of hours.
  11. When serving the cake remove the ring and decorate with coconut and sugar or the Christmas decorations that you prefer!

item.title: The Simple Risotto Recipe
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 20 min Cooking time: 1 hr 20 min Ready in: 1 hour 10 min Risotto takes a while to cook properly, and it requires your attention as well as your time.

Ingredients

  • 1 cups arborio riceb
  • 1 qt chicken stock
  • cup vermouth or another dry white wine
  • 1 medium shallot or small onion, chopped (about cup)
  • 3 Tbsp whole butter, divided
  • 1 Tbsp vegetable oil
  • cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1 Tbsp chopped Italian parsley
  • Kosher salt, to taste
 

Direction

  1. Heat the stock to a simmer in a medium saucepan, then lower the heat so that the stock just stays hot.
  2. In a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan, heat the oil and 1 Tbsp of the butter over medium heat.
  3. When the butter has melted, add the chopped shallot or onion. Saut for 23 minutes or until slightly translucent.
  4. Add rice oil and melted butter ans stir with wooden spoon.
  5. Add the wine and cook while stirring, until the liquid is fully absorbed.
  6. Add a ladle of hot chicken stock to the rice and stir until the liquid is fully absorbed. Repeat this process for three times.
  7. After 2030 minutes or until the grains are tender but still firm to the bite, without being crunchy.
  8. Stir in the remaining 2 Tbsp butter, the Parmesan cheese, and the parsley, and season to taste with Kosher salt.

item.title: Quinoa Risotto
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 20 min Cooking time: 1 hr 20 min Ready in: 1 hour 10 min Risotto takes a while to cook properly, and it requires your attention as well as your time.

Ingredients

  • 1 cups arborio riceb
  • 1 qt chicken stock
  • cup vermouth or another dry white wine
  • 1 medium shallot or small onion, chopped (about cup)
  • 3 Tbsp whole butter, divided
  • 1 Tbsp vegetable oil
  • cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1 Tbsp chopped Italian parsley
  • Kosher salt, to taste
 

Direction

  1. Rinse the quinoa in a bowl of water and drain.
  2. Heat up a saut pan to medium and add the quinoa. Roast for about 7 minutes or until golden brown.
  3. Add butter, vegetable broth, and soy milk. Stir continuously for about 10 minutes or until the quinoa is slightly tender.
  4. Add the asparagus and cook for another 5 minutes or until the liquid has been soaked up. Keep stirring.
  5. Turn off the heat, add cheeses, and stir.

item.title: Banana Blueberry Soy Smoothie
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Succulent, summer-ripe blueberries burst with flavor in this delicious smoothie. Skip the sugar or artificial sweetener for a healthier pick; the fruit makes it naturally sweet.

Ingredients

  • 1 c light soy milk
  • c frozen loose-pack blueberries
  • frozen banana, sliced
  • 2 tsp sugar or 2 packets artificial sweetener
  • 1 tsp pure vanilla extract
 

Direction

  1. 1 cup of the milk, the blueberries, banana, sugar or sweetener, and vanilla extract.
  2. Blend for 20 to 30 seconds, or until smooth. Add up to cup more milk if a thinner smoothie is desired.

item.title: Orange Juice
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Need to cool down after a tough workout or a hot day at the beach? Lap up this low-cal, citrus-infused healthy smoothie recipe.

Ingredients

  • 1 navel orange, peeled
  • c fat-free half-and-half or fat-free yogurt
  • 2 Tbsp frozen orange juice concentrate
  • tsp vanilla extract
  • 4 ice cubes
 

Direction

  1. 1 cup of the milk, the blueberries, banana, sugar or sweetener, and vanilla extract.
  2. Blend for 20 to 30 seconds, or until smooth. Add up to cup more milk if a thinner smoothie is desired.

  5. Now take out the cake and decorate it with whip cream and toppingswith berries.

item.title: Chinese Soft Fried Noodles Recipe
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 3 min Cooking time: 10 min Ready in: 60 min

Ingredients

  • 1 lb Chinese wheat noodles or spaghetti cooked according to package directions, 450 g
  • 2 tbsp peanut oil 30 ml
  • 2 tbsp sesame oil 30 ml
  • 3 large scallions green and white parts finely sliced , spring onions
  • parts for garnish
 

Direction

  1. Spread the cooked and drained noodles on a large baking sheet and allow them to dry at room temperature for 30 to 60 minutes.
  2. Heat the oils in a large non-stick skillet over high heat until the oils are very hot.
  3. Add a handful of noodles and fry until golden brown on the bottom.
  4. Turn the noodles and brown on the other side.
  5. Repeat with remaining noodles, adding more oil if necessary and making sure it is very hot before adding more noodles.
  6. Garnish with sliced scallions.

item.title: Vegetarian Pizza
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 30 min Cooking time: 1 hr Ready in: 1 hour 30 min Thisthin crust pizza dough recipe will be a hit in your house.

Ingredients

  • 5 c flour + some for dusting
  • 1 1/2 tsp yeast
  • 1 1/2 tsp sea salt
  • 2 1/4 c cold water
  • 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil
  • 2-3 spoonpizza sauce

Toppings suggestions

  • Caramelized onions
  • Arrabiata Sauce
  • Grilled Bell Peppers
  • Heirloom Tomatoes
  • Fresh Basil
  • Green Onions
  • Smoked Mozzarella Cheese
  • Sauteed Mushrooms
  • Ricotta Meatballs

Direction

  1. Preheat your oven as high as it will go for at least 45 minutes to one hour..
  2. Mix the flour, sea salt and yeast on low speed until all is incorporated then add the water.
  3. The dough should be smooth and sticky but should not stick to the sides of the bowl, only a little to the bottom.
  4. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with the basil and freshly grated parmigiana reggianno.
  5. Pour 2-3 tablespoons of the pizza sauce in the center and spread it around with the back of a spoon leaving 1 inch of space at the edges.
  6. Allow to rest for a few minute for the cheese to set.
  7. If topping with heirloom tomato slices, make sure to use the firm ones, otherwise the pizza would be watery.

item.title: Toruko Rice
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 30 min Cooking time: 1 hr Ready in: 1 hour 30 min Thisthin crust pizza dough recipe will be a hit in your house.

Ingredients

  • 1 cup of rice (we use a standard tea/coffee mug)
  • 2 tbsp ehriye (orzo or vermicelli)
  • 1 tbsp butter
  • 2 cups hot water or stock

Direction

  1. Heat your butter in a deep saucepan over a low heat.
  2. Now add your ehriye (orzo) to the pan and stir around for a few minutes until you see it start to change colour.
  3. As soon as you notice the orzo start to go brown, add your cup of rice and continue to stir. Remember to keep the pan over a low heat and keep stirring, otherwise your rice and orzo will burn.
  4. After 3-4 minutes, add the water or stock.
  5. There will be a big sizzle and the liquid will bubble up. Turn up the heat and bring the rice to the boil, fully.
  6. Once the rice is boiling, give it a couple of stirs around, put a lid on the pan, leaving a small gap, and reduce the heat to medium-low.
  7. Leave your rice to simmer for 8-10 minutes until the water or stock has absorbed.
  8. Now remove from the heat, put the lid firmly on the pan and leave your Turkish rice to stand for 5 minutes.
  9. After 5 minutes, remove the lid and fork through your rice.

item.title: Pasta with Tomato Cream Sauce
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 20 min Cooking time: 1 hr 20 min Ready in: 1 hour 10 min Add fruit accent for the great aroma and serve frozen to enhance the sweetness of this dish.

Ingredients

  • 200 gm breadcrumb
  • 2 large eggs
  • 500 gm cake flour
  • 10 gm baking powder
  • 10 gm yeast
  • 5 Tbsp sugar
  • 1/5 Tbsp salt
  • 2 cups unsaturated milk
  • 500 gm berries
 

Direction

  1. In a mixing bowl, combine breadcrumb, eggs, cake flour, baking powder, yeast, sugar, salt, and milk. Mix well and make a doe.
  2. Pre-heat oven at 220c
  3. Add that doe you made in cake pan and bake it at 220c for 20 minutes
  4. Cut berries as you like.
  5. Now take out the cake and decorate it with whip cream and toppingswith berries.

item.title: Bacon & mushroom risotto
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Prepare time: 20 min Cooking time: 1 hr 20 min Ready in: 1 hour 10 min Risotto takes a while to cook properly, and it requires your attention as well as your time.

Ingredients

  • 1 cups arborio riceb
  • 1 qt chicken stock
  • cup vermouth or another dry white wine
  • 1 medium shallot or small onion, chopped (about cup)
  • 3 Tbsp whole butter, divided
  • 1 Tbsp vegetable oil
  • cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1 Tbsp chopped Italian parsley
  • Kosher salt, to taste
 

Direction

  1. Rinse the quinoa in a bowl of water and drain.
  2. Heat up a saut pan to medium and add the quinoa. Roast for about 7 minutes or until golden brown.
  3. Add butter, vegetable broth, and soy milk. Stir continuously for about 10 minutes or until the quinoa is slightly tender.
  4. Add the asparagus and cook for another 5 minutes or until the liquid has been soaked up. Keep stirring.
  5. Turn off the heat, add cheeses, and stir.
